attributes.action: Resist the call by the Leader of the Opposition to scrap the Construction (Design and Management) Regulations 2007 (S.I., 2007, No. 320),
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new CDM regulations are a sincere attempt by Her Majestys' Government to improve safety on construction sites and the intervention by the Leader of the Opposition with EDM 1151 is not helpful in this regard.
